Reviews.Title: “Stay away!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Traveller573
Reviews.Content: I've seen dumpsters in better shape than this hotel. May want to consider sleeping in your vehicle, as opposed to staying at this hotel. Where do I start? 1) TV was straight out of the 1970's, obviously garbage picked. 2) Bed, Carpeting, walls - never been washed - just disgusting. Don't waste your time looking at this place.

Reviews.Title: “GROSS !!!!”
Reviews.Author: FreedomFighta
Reviews.Content: No Stars. WORST hotel ever. Dirty, Lied too, Moved to 3 different rooms in 2 days, will not refund the money for the rest of the week that I won't sleep here. No internet unless I want to sit at the Front Desk Free wifi Advertised. I was woke up the second morning to a crack prostitute pounding on the door at 8 AM. There is not a big enough wire brush or enough bleach to scrub the filth off that you feel when you walk in these rooms. Do not stay here .

Reviews.Title: “Don't even consider staying here!”
Reviews.Author: Ray J
Reviews.Content: The room were disgusting. There was brown stains on the bed comforter were supposed to sleep on. That's right, BIG brown stains! Plaster was coming off the walls. The carpet was musty and sticky. The sinks and toilets were stained. Honestly, how someone can think that they can actually take peoples money for this is unbelievable. We left after moving to a second room with the same problems. Then we had to dispute the charges with our credit card company.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: cheeks4u2nv
Reviews.Content: No wifi, no shuttle service, and doesn't look like they have housekeeping either! This place is absolutely disgusting! Not sure how they remain in business. Website advises wifi and shuttle service. No wifi signal in my room. Shuttle service is a scam. They are not allowed to go where they rest of the hotel shuttles go (IND Airport banned them I heard) the front desk advises to go to pax pickup / taxi area and they will pick you up there. After waiting for the shuttle, I was advised by the hotel it wasn't available currently and I'd have to take a cab (at my own expense by the way) no wifi, no shuttle, annoying... BUT ... Dirty, pubic hairs everywhere...unacceptable. Not sure the hotel owns a vacuum! The State of Indiana should shut this place down.

Reviews.Title: “Right Price and Good Value”
Reviews.Author: TOWERTREE1987
Reviews.Content: Checked in last night and room was cleaner than most places. All did was sleep and get up in the morning and leave but, overall was a good value. The parking lot is small and plenty of places to get a quick bite before heading out. I would reccomend to anyone who is budget minded as we are.

Reviews.Title: “Horriable customer service”
Reviews.Author: John F
Reviews.Content: As you walk in the lobby, there is a sign stating that if you or your friends are discovered sleeping in your car you will be fined!! management must post such a sign, it apparently happens often. As I did not have time to search elsewhere, I stayed. Upon going to the room there was no remote control and no wifi signal. Surprisingly the room was "inhabitable." Though my problem with this property was the horrible customer service. I went to work @ 8pm that evening (preforming hard physical labor), by 9am I discovered I would not be leaving the job site anytime soon (at this time I was unsure if I would stay another night or not). I called the property to inform them of my situation and was informed that if I did not retrieve my belongings from the room before check out time I would be charged a fee for "late check out." I never even took a shower in this room nor pulled the blankets back; with this type of customer service it is no wonder people prefer to sleep in their cars as opposed to dealing with management/customer service such as this.

Reviews.Title: “Poop does happen”
Reviews.Author: robin a
Reviews.Content: While my family were staying there the toilet stopped up. try as we may to plunge it, nothing worked. this went on for a week. they would send someone to plunge it. finially they moved us to a different room. plus the prostitutes from the truck stop knock on your door at all times of the night.

Reviews.Title: “Was expecting a dump was it was a suprise”
Reviews.Author: DBMaxwell
Reviews.Content: Need a room in the immediate area and this was the only place I could get. Figured it was going to be a real pit. It was much cleaner than I expected, better than several places Ive stayed that was much higher on the hog. Bed, bathroom, carpet was all fairly nice. Parking lot was way too small, had to park with the trucks. Would stay again, but only if I need to be around there again

Reviews.Title: “Bug Infested Crack House”
Reviews.Author: jmy70
Reviews.Content: First off they talk about their great comments in the office. They are from months back. The office was filthy and had a bad odor which should have been a clue to run but i needed a place to stay close to the company. I went to the room which was supposed to be non smoking but smelled of stale cigarettes. The tub was cracked as was the tile in the bathroom. I then pulled the comforter down and found stained pillow cases and sheets which look like they had blood on them. I also found 3 small bugs on the sheets. The air/ heat unit was loaded with dirt and what looked like dog hair that when it turned on just added to the stench. Behind the sofa looked like it had no been cleaned in a year. There was what appeared to be a hooker in the parking lot asking if i was staying long. I was in the room about 5 minutes and RAN out.They have a sign that says no refunds which is their way of keeping your money after they give you a nightmare room. This place should be shut down by the health board or police.

HotelInfo.Name: Knights Inn South / Airport Indianapolis
HotelInfo.Address: 4909 Knights Way, exit 4, Indianapolis, IN 46217
